channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Travis Scott & Cactus Jack Present ‘JACKBOYS 2’ Compilation Album: Stream It Now
item.description: 🚀 Get ready to vibe out! Travis Scott & Cactus Jack drop 'JACKBOYS 2' - your weekend playlist just got upgraded 🎶💥 #JACKBOYS2

item.title: 7 Best Moments From Drake’s 2025 Wireless Festival Night 2 Performance: ‘Nobody Can Out-Rap London’
item.description: Drake bringing the 🔥 at Wireless Festival Night 2! London, y'all ready for this? 🎤🎉 #Drake #WirelessFestival

item.title: Backstreet Boys Kick Off Sphere Residency With Larger-Than-Life Show in Las Vegas
item.description: 🌟 The Backstreet Boys are back and bigger than ever in Vegas! 🎤 Don't miss this epic residency kickoff! 🎉 #BSB #VegasBaby

item.title: My Chemical Romance Launch “The Black Parade” Tour: Video + Setlist
item.description: 🖤 Join My Chemical Romance on “The Black Parade” tour! Check out the epic setlist and get ready to rock! 🎶 #MCR #TheBlackParadeTour

item.title: Listen to Sigrid’s “free-spirited and joyous” new single ‘Jellyfish’
item.description: 🎶 Dive into @thisissigrid's vibrant new single 'Jellyfish' – a breath of fresh air for your playlist! 🌊💃 #NewMusicAlert
